name: Cubics (AtmoGD)
description:
In this game, new enemies appear constantly and you have to defeat them while the spawn time gets smaller and smaller over time. You can shoot, dash and create a shield. The dash and the shield are using energy (Dash: 2, Shield: 1). You are gaining energy for shooting enemies but it won't recover while you are using ether one of the skills.

Controls:

You can play the game ether with keyboard and mouse or with a gamepad.

Keyboard & Mouse:

  • The Cube will always look at the mouse pointer.
  • Move with WASD
  • Shoot with the left Mouse button
  • Dash with Shift
  • Spawn Shield with "F"

Gamepad:

  • Move with the left stick
  • Look around with the right stick
  • Shoot with the right shoulder
  • Dash with the left shoulder
  • Spawn the Shield with the West Button on your gamepad
